metadata.title: CVE-2020-13319 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions prior to 13.1.2,13.0.8 and 12.10.13. Missing permission check for adding time spent on anissue.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
